label: OGC Catalogue Service for the Web
comments: gmd:protocol value that indicates CI_OnlineResource URL is for an OGC Catalog service for the web v2.0.2 endpoint (should use differnt protocol identifier if the endpoint is not v2.0.2; these are not yet defined here).  The gmd:function value in the CI_Online resource should be 'information' if the provided URL is a getCapabilities request.

label: OGC Sensor Observation Service
comments: gmd:protocol value that indicates CI_OnlineResource URL is for an OGC Sensor Observation service v?? endpoint (should use differnt protocol identifier if the endpoint is not that version; these are not yet defined here).  The gmd:function value in the CI_Online resource should be 'information' if the provided URL is a getCapabilities request. Note that if the service offers multiple datasets in different offerings, the parameters necessary to access the correct offering should be specified in the gmd:CI_OnlineResource/gmd:description element; recommended practice is to use a JSON object with keys that are parameter names and values that are the necessary parameters.

label: OGC Sensor Planning Service
comments: gmd:protocol value that indicates CI_OnlineResource URL is for an Sensor Planning Service

label: OGC Sensor Alert Service
comments: gmd:protocol value that indicates CI_OnlineResource URL is for an Sensor Alert Service

label: OGC Web Notification Service
comments: gmd:protocol value that indicates CI_OnlineResource URL is for an Web Notification Service

label: OGC Web Coverage Service
comments: gmd:protocol value that indicates CI_OnlineResource URL is for an OGC Web coverage service v?? endpoint (should use differnt protocol identifier if the endpoint is not that version; these are not yet defined here).  The gmd:function value in the CI_Online resource should be 'information' if the provided URL is a getCapabilities request. Note that if the service offers multiple datasets in different coverages, the parameters necessary to access the correct coverage should be specified in the gmd:CI_OnlineResource/gmd:description element; recommended practice is to use a JSON object with keys that are parameter names and values that are the necessary parameters.

label: OGC Web Feature Service
comments: gmd:protocol value that indicates CI_OnlineResource URL is for an OGC Web Feature Service v?? endpoint (should use differnt protocol identifier if the endpoint is not that version; these are not yet defined here).  The gmd:function value in the CI_Online resource should be 'information' if the provided URL is a getCapabilities request. Note that if the service offers multiple datasets in different feature types the typeName parameter necessary to access the correct data should be specified in the gmd:CI_OnlineResource/gmd:description element; recommended practice is to use a JSON object with keys that are parameter names and values that are the necessary parameters.

label: OGC Web Map Service
comments: gmd:protocol value that indicates CI_OnlineResource URL is for an OGC Web Map Service v?? endpoint (should use differnt protocol identifier if the endpoint is not that version; these are not yet defined here).  The gmd:function value in the CI_Online resource should be 'information' if the provided URL is a getCapabilities request. Note that if the service offers multiple datasets in different map layers, the layers parameters necessary to access the correct data should be specified in the gmd:CI_OnlineResource/gmd:description element; recommended practice is to use a JSON object with keys that are parameter names and values that are the necessary parameters.

label: Web Map Tile Service
comments: gmd:protocol value that indicates CI_OnlineResource URL is for an OGC Web Map Tile Service

label: OGC Web Processing Service
comments: gmd:protocol value that indicates CI_OnlineResource URL is for an OGC Web Processing Service v?? endpoint (should use differnt protocol identifier if the endpoint is not that version; these are not yet defined here).  The gmd:function value in the CI_Online resource should be 'information' if the provided URL is a getCapabilities request. Other parameters necessary to access the correct processing service should be specified in the gmd:CI_OnlineResource/gmd:description element; recommended practice is to use a JSON object with keys that are parameter names and values that are the necessary parameters.

label: ESRI ArcIMS Service
comments: gmd:protocol value that indicates CI_OnlineResource URL is for an ArcIMS endpoint. ArcIMS requests are tunneled via HTTP Get URL's

label: ESRI ArcGIS Service
comments: gmd:protocol value that indicates CI_OnlineResource URL is for an ESRI Map service endpoint. ESRI REST requests are tunneled via HTTP Get URL's

label: ArcGIS Map Package
comments: Example URI for ArcGIS Map Package. Mpk is a file format. A map package contains a map document (.mxd) and the data referenced by the layers it contains, packaged into one convenient, portable file.

label: OPeNDAP root URL
comments: Link is the root URL for an OpenDAP endpoint. An OPeNDAP server replies to queries for data and other services in the form of specially formed URLs that start with a root URL, and use a suffix on the root URL and a constraint expression to indicate which service is requested and what the parameters are. Example suffixes are dods, das, dds, nc. OpenDAP defines a syntax for constraint expressions as well.

label: NetCDF Subset Service
comments: Link is the root URL for a THREDDS datasets. The NetCDF Subset Service enables subsetting CDM scientific datasets using earth coordinates, such as lat/lon bounding boxes and date ranges; requests are made via HTTP GET with key-value pairs (KVP) for parameters encoded in HTTP URIs.  The resources identified are THREDDS datasets. The resource URIs have a root host name and path, typically something like http://servername:8080/thredds/ncss/, followed by a path that identifies a particular dataset {path/dataset}. A subset of the dataset is considered a view of a resource, specified by query parameters following the character '?' after the dataset path: http://servername:8080/thredds/ncss/{path/dataset}?{subset}. An 'accept' parameter may be used to specify the desired resource representation.

label: Common Data Model Remote Web Service
comments: Example

label: Common Data Model index subsetting
comments: CDM Remote provides remote access to UNIDATA Common Data Model (CDM) datasets, using ncstream as the on-the-wire protocol. Client requests are of the form endpoint?query, and the specification defines a vocabulary of valid query parameters. There are two levels of service: 1) CdmRemote provides index subsetting on remote CDM datasets; 2) CdmrFeature provides coordinate subsetting on remote CDM Feature Datasets

label: Common Data Model coordinate subsetting
comments: Link is endpoint URL that provides coordinate subsetting on UNIDATA Common Data Model (CDM) datasets, using ncstream as the on-the-wire protocol. Client requests are of the form endpoint?query, and the specification defines a vocabulary of valid query parameters.

label: OGC Geography Markup Language
comments: Example

label: Web Address (URL)
comments: Indicates that XLINK properties are encoded as key-value pairs in content of a dct:references element to provide a machine actionable link.

label: Web Service Description Language XML document describing service operation
SPARQL Query Language for RDF
comments: gmd:protocol value that indicates CI_OnlineResource URL is for a SPARQL endpoint

label: OpenSearch template
comments: use to indicate link is a template conforming to the OpenSearch specification

label: OpenSearch description document
comments: indicates a link to get an openSearch description document

label: link provides information about resource
comments: function of link it to http:GET information about resource

label: link provides template to access resource
comments: Link text is a URI template; applicationProfile attribute value associated with the link should indicate the specification for the template scheme (e.g. OpenSearch1.1).

label: link will get resource
comments: function of link it to http:GET a representation of the resource; the link type attribute value(s) should indicate the MIME types of available representations

label: link is service endpoint
comments: Link value is the URL of a service endpoint; the link protocol and applicationProfile (and possibly other link properties like overlayAPI, depending on the link attributes profile in use) attribute values should identify the service protocol specification

label: link provides form to obtain resource
comments: link value is URL of web application requiring user interaction to order/request access to the resource

label: link provides form for searching resource
comments: link value is URL of web application requiring user interaction to search/browse/subset the resource.

label: tile mill map service description
comments: link is description of a TileMill map service endpoint. Link type would be application/json; function would be information.

label: IRIS Seismic event service
comments: Link returns event (earthquake) information from the catalogs submitted to the IRIS DMC

label: Earthquake markup language
comments: XML markup language for earthquake hypocenter data

label: a file
comments: CKAN metadata vocabulary for populating the type attribute on a CKAN resource; indicates that an http  GET of this url should yield a bitstream

label: ISO 19115 metadata in ISO19139 encoding
comments: This is the CharacterString value used by Geonetwork OpenSource to identify ISO metadata record instances; apparently have to assume that its using the 2006 corrigendum with no specific profile conventions.

label: USGIN-profile ISO 19115 metadata
comments: This is the CharacterString Value mandated by the USGIN profile of ISO19115/19139 for instance documents to self-identify.

label: Hypertext transfer Protocol, v1.1
comments: Use to indicate gmd:CI_OnlineResource URLs that are simple http links to a target resource representation for download; redundant as the URL prefix 'http:' conveys the same information.

label: GeoJSON
comments: GeoJSON is a geospatial data interchange format based on JavaScript Object Notation (JSON)

label: OGC SensorThings API
comments: gmd:protocol value that indicates CI_OnlineResource URL is for a SensorThings API

label: GIT
comments: gmd:protocol value that indicates CI_OnlineResource URL is for a GIT repository

label: Boundless GeoGig
comments: gmd:protocol value that indicates CI_OnlineResource URL is for a GeoGig REST API

label: dat REST API
comments: gmd:protocol value that indicates CI_OnlineResource URL is for a dat REST API

label: GeoServer REST configuration API
comments: gmd:protocol value that indicates CI_OnlineResource URL is for a Geoserver rest API to configure featuretypes in Geoserver (and mapserver) remotely
